EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-09 Takeaways on Gartner Conference 2018.ES 1 - SL 1 - Segment B
EmailTemplate.subject: Gartner Cloud Strategies Conference Key Takeaways
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pLAAQ]]>
Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pLAAQ]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, As you've expressed interest in Gartner reports and events in the past, I thought that you might be interested in our upcoming Gartner IT Infrastructure, Operations, and Cloud Strategies Conference 2018 Takeaways Webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pLAAQ]]> on Wednesday, January 9th at 11 a.m. ET.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pLAAQ]]>
Gartner IOCS attendee and VP of Product Marketing, Bob Wambach, will share a post-event recap, in case you were unable to attend this year's conference. In 30-minutes, we'll cover the key announcements from the event and discuss how they will impact you and your team in 2019. Attend and you'll be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there! Regards, Andrew
